channel.title: Place a new object
channel.description: Well im trying to make a new pking area and i dont know how to place objects like boxes to make a wall around the area. If some1 would give me a basic code example or a program to do it, it would be much appreciated.

item.title: Place a new object
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

Search public void NewObjects() { in your Client.Java and add this at the bottom of that text add

AddGlobalObject(Xcoord, Ycoord, Object ID, 0, 10);//barrier

Donâ€™t edit the last two numbers; add the Xcoords on the first one and Y on 2nd and object id on 3rd.
